quote_first: Hadn’t Father Presteign said that the post came at nine or shortly after? “Shortly after” could mean anything. They could be waiting for half an hour.
quote_last: . Seven minutes past. And then it came.
title: A Certain Justice
author: P.D. James

quote_last: lay in bed, staring at ceiling.
title: A Fraction of the Whole
author: Steve Toltz

quote_first: Kaldren pursues me like luminescent shadow. He has chalked up on the gateway ‘96,688,365,498,702’. Should confuse the mail man. Woke
title: The Voices of Time
author: J.G. Ballard

quote_first: The tour of the office doesn’t take that long. In fact, we’re pretty much done by
quote_last: Ed looks at everything twice and says it’s all great, and gives me a list of contacts who might be helpful, then has to leave for his own office.
title: Twenties Girl
author: Sophie Kinsella
